amendment.description: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to prevent a State from implementing its own State laws that authorize the use, distribution, possession, or cultivation of industrial hemp.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to prohibit the use of funds to prevent a State from implementing its own State laws that authorize the use, distribution, possession, or cultivation of industrial hemp.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A053) Agreed to by recorded vote: 282 - 146 (Roll no. 280).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
Roll call votes on amendments in House
House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Bonamici amendment (A053) Agreed to by recorded vote: 282 - 146 (Roll no. 280).
